alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 7:55PM CST until March 13 at 10:30AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Illinois... Embarras River at Lawrenceville affecting Lawrence County. .The following forecasts are based on observed precipitation, soil moisture conditions, and forecast precipitation. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Embarras River at Lawrenceville. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Kelly`s Lake Lane, 1160N, is inundated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CST Thursday the stage was 32.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 PM CST Thursday was 32.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 32.7 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Embarras River Lawrenceville 30.0 32.6 Thu 6 pm CST 32.4 31.0 29.0 &&
info.instruction: Persons with interests along this river need to prepare for flooding. Stay tuned for further updates on this flooding situation.
